title: Lynda - Dropbox for Photographers
description:
Lynda - Dropbox for Photographers

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 8m Intermediate Jul 21, 2015  | Uploaded in Oct 7, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Photography 
Author: Derrick Story 
 
Dropbox is a natural fit for photographers. With Dropbox, you can access images on the go, back up important work, and with the new app, Carousel, create image galleries that clients can view and comment on. Learn how to use the Dropbox cloud-storage service for all of this and more, in this course with author/photographer Derrick Story. Derrick reviews the photo-friendly features of Dropbox, including automatic backups, mobile apps to use Dropbox on the go, and smart syncing features to access the same library of images from your desktop, phone, tablet, and any device with cloud access.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Understanding free vs. paid Dropbox plans
	â€¢	Installing Dropbox
	â€¢	Setting up folders and shared folders
	â€¢	Selective syncing
	â€¢	Setting up the Dropbox mobile app
	â€¢	Integrating Carousel
	â€¢	Creating albums
	â€¢	Renaming and moving photos
	â€¢	Deleting files
	â€¢	Uploading files from a memory card, a computer, Lightroom, or iPhoto
	â€¢	Sharing photos from Carousel or Dropbox
